mapper.select: select case (select count(*) from tbl_login where login_id = #{id} and login_pwd = #{pwd} and login_status in (1,9)) when 1 then 1 else ( case (select count(*) from tbl_login where login_id = #{id}) when 1 then 0 else -1 end ) end as LOGINCHECK from dual
select login_id, login_pwd, login_name, login_status from tbl_login where login_status in (1,9) and login_id = #{id}
update tbl_login set login_pwd = #{pwd} where login_id = #{userid}
